metadata.title: CVE-2022-2320 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
X.Org Server ProcXkbSetDeviceInfo Out-Of-Bounds Access

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2022-2320` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

xdmx - 2:1.20.13-1ubuntu1.2
xdmx-tools - 2:1.20.13-1ubuntu1.2
xnest - 2:1.20.13-1ubuntu1.2
xorg-server-source - 2:1.20.13-1ubuntu1.2
xserver-common - 2:1.20.13-1ubuntu1.2
xserver-xephyr - 2:1.20.13-1ubuntu1.2
xserver-xorg-core - 2:1.20.13-1ubuntu1.2
xserver-xorg-legacy - 2:1.20.13-1ubuntu1.2
xvfb - 2:1.20.13-1ubuntu1.2
No subscription required

xwayland - 2:21.1.2-0ubuntu1.2
No subscription required

notes.note: mdeslaur> xorg server is actually the xorg-server package the xorg package only contains docs xwayland package contains parts of xorg-server

criterions.comment: xorg-server package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:1.20.13-1ubuntu1.2').
xwayland package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:21.1.2-0ubuntu1.2').
